api-dice-title: Utilisez API Dice Roller (API est une fonctionnalité Pro). Le Script « Forbidden Lands Year-Zero Die Roller » doit être installé.

condition-cold:
When it's bitter cold and you don't have enough shelter, succeed on Endurance roll or become cold.
 Chilly Fall Day 1/day
 Depth of Winter 1/hour
 Immediately take 1 damage to STR and WIT.
 Keep rolling Endurance with same effect on failure.
 If STR is broken, you die next time you have to roll.
 Can't recover STR or WIT until you have warmed.
condition-hungry:
You must eat 1 ration once a day or become hungry.
Can't recover STR except by magic.
Suffer 1 damage to STR per week.
If Broken, you die after 1 week without food.
As soon as you eat, you are longer hungry.
condition-sleepy:
You must sleep for at least one Quarter Day of each day or become sleepy.
 Can't recover WIT, except by magic.
 If Broken, you must sleep to get back up.
 Suffer 1 damage to WIT each day.
 If this damage breaks WIT, you collapse and sleep for at least one Quarter Day.
 As soon as you sleep, you are no longer sleepy.
condition-thirsty:
You must drink 1 ration of water per day or become thirsty.
 Cannot recover attributes except by magic.
 If Broken, you need to drink water to get back up.
 Suffer 1 damage to both STR and AGI every day.
 If STR or AGI are broken, you die after 1 more day without water.
 As soon as you drink you are not thirsty.
consumable-note: note: be sure to manually reduce the consumable die on the sheet if you roll bane of 1 or 2.
extra-damage: Basculer le suivi des dégâts extra (25-48)
include-grimoire: Casting from a Grimoire reduces the Spell's Rank by -1 which reduces the dice rolled by one.
include-ingredients: Using Ingredients adds +1 to the Base Power Level.
include-willpower: Adding Willpower increases the Base Power Level and the number of dice rolled.

push-query: Le jeu de dés est-il correct... ? (Indice : supprimer les succès et les fléaux) |Oui - Soumettre au jet de dé, le jeu de dés est correct. |Non - Annuler, le jeu de dés a besoin d'être corrigé.
